WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is correct, you are losing a ton of DPS because you are running OoM so it's recommending options to improve mana pool/regen
WorkItem.Description:
When no mana regen or comsumption reduction talents is activated (in elemental tree: Convection, elemental focus; in enhancement tree: shamanistic focus, improved stormstrike) rawr propose to enhance the equipement with intelligence, mana regen, spell power item (the most reliant stat in relative stat value tabs is intelligence and mp5).
Excuse me if my english is approximative.
